TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceThrottle extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制服務輸送量，以便最佳化可用性和效能。

span.span: Controls the throughput of a service to optimize availability and performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ，即可調整服務的效能特性。Use the to tune the performance characteristics of a service. 為服務設定 的最簡易方式是使用 ，尤其是從應用程式組態檔中進行設定。The easiest way to configure the for a service is to use the , especially from an application configuration file. 屬性會指定在 物件中所有發送器物件上主動處理訊息的數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across all the dispatcher objects in a object. 屬性會指定服務中 物件的數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of objects in the service. 屬性會指定 可以接受的工作階段數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of sessions a can accept. > [!NOTE] > 當第一個呼叫、 或工作階段佇列排入等候清單 (Waitlist) 時，就會寫入追蹤。A trace is written when the first call, , or session is queued on the waitlist. 第一個追蹤會寫入成為警告。The first trace is written as a warning. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範參考應用程式組態檔內 的典型 用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在此情況下，所指定的值一次最多會建立一個訊息處理 (從一個連線到一個 )。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 實際用法必須取決於經驗。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentCalls { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在 中的所有發送器物件上主動處理訊息的數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of messages actively processing across all dispatcher objects in a .

value.span: 在服務內作用中訊息的上限。

span.span: The upper limit of active messages in the service.

value.span: 預設為 16 \* 電腦上的處理器數目。

span.span: The default is 16 \* number of processors in the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定在 物件中所有發送器物件上主動處理訊息的數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across all the dispatcher objects in a object. 每個通道可以有一個暫止訊息，而這個訊息在 開始處理它之前，不會計算在 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 的值中。Each channel can have one pending message that does not count against the value of until [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] begins to process it. > [!NOTE] > 每當超過這個屬性值時，就會寫入至追蹤。A trace is written every time the value of this property is exceeded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範參考應用程式組態檔內 的典型 用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在此情況下，所指定的值一次最多會建立一個訊息處理 (從一個連線到一個 )。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 實際用法必須取決於經驗。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可以同時執行服務物件的數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of service objects that can execute at one time.

value.span: 同時存在服務中的 物件數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of objects in the service at one time.

value.span: 預設值為最大並行呼叫 + 最大並行工作階段。

span.span: The default is Maximum Concurrent Calls + Maximum Concurrent Sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定服務中 物件的數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of objects in the service. 請務必牢記 屬性和 屬性之間的關聯性。It is important to keep in mind the relationship between the property and the property. 如果是產生的值是工作階段總數。If is the resulting value is the total number of sessions. 如果 是 ，則產生的值是同時呼叫的數目。If is , the resulting value is the number of concurrent calls. 如果訊息在已有最大數目的 物件存在時抵達，則會保留該訊息，直到 物件關閉為止。If a message arrives while the maximum number of objects already exist, the message is held until an object closes. > [!NOTE] > 每當超過這個屬性值時，就會寫入至追蹤。A trace is written every time the value of this property is exceeded. 第一個追蹤會寫入成為警告。The first trace is written as a warning. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範參考應用程式組態檔內 的典型 用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在此情況下，所指定的值一次最多會建立一個訊息處理 (從一個連線到一個 )。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 實際用法必須取決於經驗。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentSessions { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 物件一次可以接受的工作階段數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of sessions a object can accept at one time.

value.span: 服務主機接受工作階段的數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of sessions a service host accepts.

value.span: 預設值為 100 \* 處理器的電腦中的數量。

span.span: The default is 100 \* number of processors in the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定 可以接受的通道數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of channels a can accept. 每個接聽程式 (Listener) 物件可以有一個暫止通道，而這個通道在 接受它並開始在其中處理訊息之前，不會計算在 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 的值中。Each listener object can have one pending channel that does not count against the value of until [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] accepts the channel and begins processing messages on it. 這個屬性在運用工作階段的案例中最為有用。This property is most useful in scenarios that make use of sessions. > [!NOTE] > 每當超過這個屬性值時，就會寫入至追蹤。A trace is written every time the value of this property is exceeded. 第一個追蹤會寫入成為警告。The first trace is written as a warning. 如需工作階段的詳細資訊，請參閱[Sessions<](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md)。For more information about sessions, see [Using Sessions](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md). 一般而言，使用 屬性便可設定這個屬性。Typically, this property is set using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範參考應用程式組態檔內 的典型 用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在此情況下，所指定的值一次最多會建立一個訊息處理 (從一個連線到一個 )。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 實際用法必須取決於經驗。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]
